text: I have a teammate using ESET Smart Security 9 and when she did the full scan of her C drive, she's receiving errors saying 'error opening' after all of her files as shown in the picture. She tried to run ESET as administrator and got the same results, does anyone know how to avoid this?
hm. I have no experience with ESET.  maybe try doing a 'registry- scan for issues' with CCleaner ?
Ok I'll ask her to try that and see what happens
